description: Our services include: annual exams and vaccines, wellness care, spay and neuters, dental cleanings, and a full range of soft tissue surgeries including cruciate rupture repair surgery. We feature digital X-rays (including dental), in house lab and pharmacy, ultrasound, wellness plans, grooming and boarding facilities and a full line of food, flea and heart worm preventatives for your pet. We also offer multiple financing options for your pets care. Treat your pet with Kindness.
highlights: Winner of the 2018 Tulsa People A-List Reader’s Choice Award
associations: American Association of Feline Practioners, Director of the Oklahoma Chapter of The Paw Project

description: First Place Best of the Best from Oklahoma Magazine! Thank You Tulsa and NE Oklahoma for your vote of confidence with so many quality Veterinary practices in NE Oklahoma. We were recognized for our state-of-the-art facilities/equipment and national award winning hospital design.

MISSION STATEMENT: Care Animal Hospital is committed to serving pet animals and their owners by delivering the highest quality of care possible. We recognize that your pet is an integral member of your family. Because your pet's nice health is a priority to our team, we'll keep you informed of the finest opportunities for prevention, diagnosis, and treatment of disease.

Pets are special companions and friends. Be sure to take attention of them with professional veterinary care by Valley Glen Veterinary Hospital, PC. Located in Tulsa, Oklahoma, we are an animal hospital featuring quality veterinary care plus boarding services for cats and dogs. Now under new ownership, we are proud to provide a clean clinic with caring, friendly service for both you and your pets!

At Jacox Animal Clinic, we know how much your pets mean to you. And because they're part of the family, your pets deserve the finest medical care available. We hold a unique track record in caring for pets just like your and that is why Jacox Animal Clinic is the right choice for quality veterinary services.

We supply a wide spectrum of diagnostic procedures through in-house testing and the use of external laboratories. We  work closely with local practices when special diagnostic procedures are required. The facility includes a well-stocked pharmacy, in-hospital surgery suite, in-house x-ray capabilities, ultrasound, a closely supervised hospitalization area, and indoor boarding kennels with outdoor walking areas.

Feline Specialties Veterinary Hospital is a cats only facility situated in Tulsa, Oklahoma. We provide a complete array of services for our feline friends. Our facility is situated at 9702 S. Riverside in Tulsa, Oklahoma. We are pleased to cover the Tulsa and Jenks Area. We supply numerous services to assist you care for your feline companions.

Our doctors and team are here to serve you and your pet's veterinary requirements, providing affectionate and conscientious care of the quality we would want our own pets to receive. We are a complete service veterinary hospital, treating cats and dogs, as well as exotics, such as ferrets, birds, snakes, reptiles, amphibians and fish.

We began with half the space we currently have now and had to have the kennel built for boarding. Over the years, our team has expanded to nine and our customer base to over 4,000 customers. We are  devoted to the welfare of the helpless animals in our community.

business_name: Woodland West Animal Hospital - Mike Jones
description: Your information is kept totally private! Woodland West Animal Hospital is building a new facility! Visit the hospital site for photos of our progress! We are an active and dedicated staff of Veterinarians, Registered Veterinary Technicians, Pet Care Technicians, and Veterinary Assistants.

WELCOME South Memorial Animal Hospital is an accredited member of the American Animal Hospital Association AAHA since 1977. AAHA's standards cover nearly every kind of our hospital, including surgery, pharmacy, laboratory, exam facilities, pet health records, cleanliness, emergency services, dental and nursing care, diagnostic imaging, and anesthesiology.

business_name: Cedarwood Veterinary Clinic - Robert W Poteet
description: When it comes to caring for your pet, there's no such thing as too nice. We provide complete medical and dental services for your family pet. Our friendly team understands how important your pet is to you. Our doctors, Robert Poteet, DVM, Bill Gooldy, DVM, and Wendy Sales, DVM, all care dearly about your pet.

Set up in 1973, Veterinary Associates animal hospital has become one of the most trusted veterinary hospitals in Oklahoma delivering quality care to pets in the Tulsa area for over 30 years. Our highly-trained and compassionate team understands that your pet is a cherished member of your family.

Animal Medical and Surgical Hospital is a full service animal hospital.  We treat all small animals including dogs, cats and exotic pets (rabbits, reptiles, ferrets, birds, rats, guinea pigs, sugar gliders, wolves, foxes, tigers and more).  We provide dental services, surgical procedures, ultrasound, digital X-Ray, boarding, grooming, preventive care (vaccinations), heartworm prevention, flea and tick prevention and much more.
highlights: Cats, Dogs and Exotic Pets Welcome
